dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ice cream is a sweet, frozen treat made from dairy products like milk and cream, often with added flavors and fruits.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hello what do you want to talk about?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Chocolate and candy mix-ins make ice cream even more delicious, turning it into a sweet, frozen masterpiece!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm obsessed with ice cream. I love anything with chocolate and candy in it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ben & Jerry's is known for their creative flavors and mix-ins, like chocolate, candy, and caramel, making their ice cream an irresistible treat!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Caramel goes well with it too. I like Ben & Jerry's

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Blue Ribbon also makes some tasty ice cream with great flavors and mix-ins.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's so good. blue ribbon is really good too

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Haagen-Dazs is definitely a premium choice with its rich flavors, but the price and availability can be a bummer sometimes!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I like Hagen Daas I just wish it wasn't so expensive and I almost never find the flavors I like from them

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Milkshakes are a great way to enjoy the creamy goodness of ice cream in a delicious, drinkable form!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You know what I like about ice cream probably the most? Milkshakes!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those flavors sound amazing in milkshake form, blending the creamy goodness of ice cream with delicious mix-ins!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Whenever I'm at parlor I usually get a blueberry shake or a cookie dough shake if either are options

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wow, those sound like some fun and unique shake flavors to try, especially the egg nog one during the holidays!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I lived near a McDonald's that used our location as a test market for their shakes. They had a blueberry shake that was out of control good for about a year. Later they had a rassberry shake that was pretty good too, and an egg nog shake during two holiday seasons

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Egg nog and ice cream are a perfect combo for a festive and creamy treat during the holidays!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I usually make my own egg nog shake during the holidays! I love egg nog and it goes well with ice cream

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Making your own egg nog shake with vanilla ice cream and egg nog sounds like a delicious way to enjoy a festive treat!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When I see egg nog ice cream I usually buy it...but I do like making my own with either freezing vanilla ice cream with egg nog and freezing it...or making a shake out of the two

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ice cream is indeed hard to resist, with its sweet, creamy texture and endless varieties of flavors and mix-ins!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I mean how can one not like ice cream? It's so delicious
